The video was posted on April 1: indicating that it was likely an April Fool's Day joke.
The images of the: dragon skeleton" were taken from a 2004 fantasy docudrama called "Dragons: A Fantasy Made Real."
The mockumentary: Dragons: A Fantasy Made Real" has been causing confusion about the existence of dragons since its release.
Similar mockumentaries: such as one about the "discovery" of a mermaid, have been aired on Animal Planet in the past.
